scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run copy-assets && npm run build-js:analytics && npm run minfiy-build-js
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build-sass: rm -rf dist/public/style.css && sass --load-path=node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk --no-source-map src/assets/scss/application.scss dist/public/style.css --style compressed
scripts.concat-client-js: mkdir -p dist/public/scripts && uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/cookies.js src/assets/javascript/application.js -o dist/public/scripts/application.js -b
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && npm run concat-client-js && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.njk dist/ src/locales/**/** dist/ src/config/*.txt dist/ && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js dist/public/scripts && cp src/assets/javascript/showPassword.js dist/public/scripts
scripts.deep-clean: npm cache clear --force && npm cache clean --force && npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.minfiy-build-js: uglifyjs dist/public/scripts/application.js -o dist/public/scripts/application.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/public/scripts/all.js -o dist/public/scripts/all.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/public/scripts/showPassword.js -o dist/public/scripts/showPassword.js -c -m
scripts.test:integration: rm -rf test/coverage && NODE_ENV=development nyc mocha -r dotenv/config -P tsconfig.mocha.json  "src/**/*-integration.test.ts"
scripts.test:unit: rm -rf test/coverage && NODE_ENV=development nyc mocha -r dotenv/config --exclude "src/**/*-integration.test.ts"  "test/unit/**/*.test.ts" --recursive "src/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test: rm -rf test/coverage && NODE_ENV=development nyc mocha -r dotenv/config  "test/unit/**/*.test.ts" --recursive "src/**/*.test.ts"
